lead_paragraph: The schedule for the 10th-place Rangers appears to be substantially easier than that of two of the teams directly above them.
snippet: The schedule for the 10th-place Rangers appears to be substantially easier than that of two of the teams directly above them.

headline.main: Schedule Favors Rangers in Push for the Playoffs
